name: Scalable Life Sciences
goal: Scalable Life Sciences is a strategic communications consultancy specializing in life sciences. The company offers consultancy and execution in corporate  communications, public affairs / lobbying, market acces, investor relations and marketing communications.
interests: Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Life Sciences, biotechnology, advanced therapies, chemical substances, environmental policy, drinking water and innovation.
